heroDescription: A specialist in 3D interactive design and high-performance digital architecture, delivering web experiences with unparalleled depth and feel.
aboutDescription: I specialize in creating beautiful, responsive, and interactive web applications. My stack includes Next.js, Three.js, Framer Motion, and Tailwind CSS. I love building 3D-enhanced, animated, and high-performance user experiences.
contactSubtitle: I am currently open to exciting new roles and freelance projects. Let's start a conversation about your next digital innovation.
footerTechInfo: Designed with Framer Motion, Next.js & Three.js.
chatBotGreeting: Hello! I am your AI assistant. I can help you find information about the developer, Khorn Saokhouch.
chatBotDefault: I am here to help you! Ask me about skills, projects, or contact info.
chatBotSkills: Khorn specializes in Next.js, Three.js (R3F), Framer Motion, and high-performance front-end architecture.
chatBotProjects: You can find his featured projects in the 'Projects' section above, including interactive 3D showrooms!
chatBotContact: The contact form is at the bottom of the page, or you can check the 'Contact' link in the navbar.
